name: Confederatia Nationala Sindicala Cartel ALFA
goal:
National Trade Union Confederation "Cartel ALFA" was founded in 1990 with the purpose of establishing a real and authentic representation of the Romanian workers.
A clear mission
The fundamental objective of the NTUC "Cartel ALFA" is to strengthen the romanian democracy and to defend and protect the interests of the workers and the social justice. The confederation constantly militates for job creation, improving the life and working conditions of its members, for a proper wage policy and for stability and sustainable development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: European Pillar of Social Rights, collective bargaining and workers rights, European Labour Authority, posting of workers, qualifications framework, work-life balance, access to public services, poverty reduction etc.
